|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64FVSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Lantiq;PSB 8221;XWAY WAVE300, PSB 8221 EL, V1.1; |rad2chip2 = Lantiq;PSB 8301;XWAY WAVE300, PSB 8301 V, V1.1; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2011500132", "Rev:1.0" and the ''TP-LINK'' logo is silkscreened on :the board in the FCC photos.. and in the image shown below.
This device is using a [[Lantiq]] PSB 8221 PCI MAC/BB for the 5GHz radio. :The 2.4GHz radio is a separate [[Atheros]] AR9287 PCIe Wi-Fi IC.
Default settings (including SSID formats) are per '''TP-LINK''''s manual. :Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::243 mm x 160.6 mm x 32.5 mm]] <!--per '''TP-LINK''''s product page, are-->
===PSU=== The power adapter shown (FCC photos) is a '''HuntKey''' HKA01812015-2K :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.5A).
==Links of Interest== [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/gpl/GPL_TD-W8980.tar.gz Current GPL source code tarball]
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/archive/index.php/t-2536618.html ''TP-LINK TD-W8980 v1'' on '''HWUpgrade''' forums]
===Vendor links=== *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833704176 On '''Newegg'''] *[http://www.amazon.com/TP-Link-Wireless-ADSL2-Router-TD-W8980/dp/B00C4OANW0 On '''Amazon''']
